name: R5-MessageSignificanceCategory-R4-MessageSignificanceCategory
title: Concept map to convert a FHIR R5 MessageSignificanceCategory into a FHIR R4 MessageSignificanceCategory

element.display: The message represents/requests a change that should not be processed more than once; e.g., making a booking for an appointment.

target.display: The message represents/requests a change that should not be processed more than once; e.g., making a booking for an appointment.

element.display: The message represents a response to query for current information. Retrospective processing is wrong and/or wasteful.

target.display: The message represents a response to query for current information. Retrospective processing is wrong and/or wasteful.

element.display: The content is not necessarily intended to be current, and it can be reprocessed, though there may be version issues created by processing old notifications.

target.display: The content is not necessarily intended to be current, and it can be reprocessed, though there may be version issues created by processing old notifications.
